item.title: [CXF-2418] SchemaCollection throws StackOverflowError when schema contains circular reference
item.description:

item.summary: SchemaCollection throws StackOverflowError when schema contains circular reference

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Patch file that prevents the StackOverflowError, by ensuring that for each xmlSchema we only check each schemaElement once for cross imports, i.e. if it is encountered again it will be ignored.
